mapper.select: select* from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from notice_board, area_data where b_addinfo = a_no and b_checkeddel = 0 order by b_no desc)a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5

select * from (select ROWNUM rnum, a.*, (select a_name from area_data where a_no = b_addinfo) a_name, (select d_name from detail_data where a_no = b_addinfo and d_no= b_detailinfo) d_name from (select * from selectdiscussion_board where b_checkeddel = 0 and b_addinfo = #{a_no} order by b_no desc) a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5 and b_addinfo= #{a_no}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, allList.*, rank() over(order by b_agree desc) as ranking from (select ad.a_name,dd.d_name, pb.* from petition_board pb,area_data ad, detail_data dd where b_addinfo=dd.a_no and b_detailinfo = dd.d_no and b_addinfo=ad.a_no and b_agree >= 5 and b_addinfo=#{a_no} and b_delno='N' and b_enddate >=sysdate order by b_enddate desc) allList ) where ranking <= 5 and rownum <= 5 order by ranking
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from complaint_board , area_data where b_addinfo = a_no order by b_no desc) a) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 5 and b_addinfo= #{a_no}
select * from user_info where u_address = #{a_name} and u_position = 1
select count(*) from user_info where u_address = #{a_name} and u_position = 1

select * from user_info
where u_name like '%' || #{keywordAll} || '%'
and u_position = 1
select * from user_info where u_detail = (select d_name from detail_data where d_no=#{d_no} and a_no=#{a_no})

select count(*) from user_info
where u_name like '%' || #{keywordAll} || '%'
